skill.name: senior-data-scientist
skill.description: World-class data science skill for statistical modeling, experimentation, causal inference, and advanced analytics. Expertise in Python (NumPy, Pandas, Scikit-learn), R, SQL, statistical methods, A/B testing, time series, and business intelligence. Includes experiment design, feature engineering, model evaluation, and stakeholder communication. Use when designing experiments, building predictive models, performing causal analysis, or driving data-driven decisions.
skill.summary: World-class data science skill for statistical modeling, experimentation, causal inference, and adva...
skill.author: davila7

security_audit.summary: Prompt-based AI skill with supporting Python CLI scripts. Scripts are legitimate skeleton templates for data science workflows with no network calls, credential access, or malicious patterns. All code follows standard CLI practices.

content.value_statement: Design experiments, build predictive models, and drive data-driven decisions with expert-level data science techniques. This skill provides production-grade frameworks for statistical analysis, feature engineering, and model evaluation.
actual_capabilities: Design and analyze A/B tests with statistical rigor
Build feature engineering pipelines for ML models
Perform causal inference and statistical analysis
Create experiment frameworks for business decisions
limitations: Requires user-provided data and computational resources
Does not execute code without explicit user prompts
Cannot access external APIs or data sources directly

use_cases.title: Build ML pipelines
use_cases.description: Design feature engineering workflows and evaluate models with production best practices

use_cases.title: Run A/B experiments
use_cases.description: Design statistically valid experiments and interpret results for product decisions

use_cases.title: Analyze datasets
use_cases.description: Perform causal analysis and statistical modeling on research data

prompt_templates.title: Analyze A/B test
prompt_templates.prompt: Analyze these A/B test results. Calculate statistical significance, confidence intervals, and provide recommendations. Use senior data scientist expertise.

prompt_templates.title: Design features
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a feature engineering pipeline for this dataset. Suggest transformations, encoding strategies, and feature selection methods.

prompt_templates.title: Evaluate model
prompt_templates.prompt: Evaluate this model using production-grade metrics. Include accuracy, precision, recall, F1, ROC-AUC, and provide improvement suggestions.

prompt_templates.title: Causal analysis
prompt_templates.prompt: Perform causal inference analysis on this observational dataset. Identify potential confounders and suggest appropriate statistical methods.

output_examples.input: Analyze our A/B test results. We tested a new checkout flow with 10,000 users. Control conversion: 3.2%, Treatment conversion: 3.8%.
output: Follow-up: Monitor for novelty effects in weeks 2-4

best_practices: Always validate statistical assumptions before choosing analysis methods
Document experiment design and decision criteria before running tests
Use cross-validation and holdout sets when evaluating models
anti_patterns: Ignoring multiple comparison corrections in A/B testing
Evaluating models only on accuracy without checking for bias

faq.question: What AI tools support this skill?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Claude Code, and Codex. Use with any LLM that supports tool calling.

faq.question: What data formats are supported?
faq.answer: Accepts CSV, JSON, Parquet, and SQL query results. Provide data or specify format in prompts.

faq.question: Can this run Python code?
faq.answer: The skill provides guidance and templates. Actual code execution depends on your environment setup.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: All processing happens locally. The skill does not send data to external services or store information.

faq.question: How long should experiments run?
faq.answer: Sample size calculators help determine duration. Generally 1-2 weeks for web experiments with daily traffic.

faq.question: How does this compare to hiring a data scientist?
faq.answer: Provides expert-level guidance and frameworks. Complex implementations may require human data scientists.
